<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Lights

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if lampost is on (shining).
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> A lamp state is '''local''' to each client (see [[switchLight]]).</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3 </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command was originally designed to only work with CfgNonAIVehicles class "StreetLamp" only;
since <template><title>arma3</title></template> v1.92 this command was extended to work with street lights.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[lightIsOn]] lamppost

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> lamppost: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - Can be one of:
* '''"ON"''' - light is on
* '''"OFF"''' - light is off
* '''"AUTO"''' - applicable only to the light of type "StreetLamp" and is only on during the night.
* '''"ERROR"''' - if command fails

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[lightIsOn]] [[nearestObject]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[player]], "StreetLamp"] == "ON") [[then]] { [[hint]] "nightime"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_it = lightIsOn [[object]] 159582</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[count]] [[allMissionObjects]] "StreetLamp" == 0) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] "Objects compatible with 'lightIsOn' are not found.";
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "'lightIsOn' compatible objects are found!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[switchLight]]
</value></part></template>
